ygData.subject: RE: Why bother with pottery?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... What vendor, where??? Another potter may have sold the vials to the vendor, but I do not think that there is a vendor who sells these on a regular basis!!!
ygData.messageBody:
> For awhile, I made some of the poison vials (pottery's new role in
> the "player based economy" lie). Then I ran across an NPC in Freeport
> market that sells them for less than I can make them for.

What vendor, where??? Another potter may have sold the vials to the vendor,
but I do not think that there is a vendor who sells these on a regular
basis!!!

I have been making/selling 100's of poison vials to the small rogue
community on my server (to see how small on yours type /who all rogue 20
50), and doubling my investment (on supplies) with every sale.

-----Original Message-----
From: Bonecrkr [mailto:bonecrkr@...]
Sent: Friday, August 13, 1999 5:31 AM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Potters] Why bother with pottery?


From: "Bonecrkr" <bonecrkr@...>
Why are you bothering to do this? Pottery was completely nerfed in the last
patch. For awhile, I made some of the poison vials (pottery's new role in
the "player based economy" lie). I ran across an NPC in Freeport
market that sells them for less than I can make them for. Like it mattered.
I found the rogues on E. Marr at least, to be completely uninterested in
buying vials from me (even when I dropped the price to cost). Instead, they
would simply develop pottery. When they discover they can simply buy the
vials for FAR less, they won't even do this.
